message: We could then give a badge.

So when a new member joins we send out an email listing our networks like irc, the wiki etc... What if we made it into a challenge where you have to do each step, find a phrase that is on the completed page and enter it into a step by step log, so when you complete the signups of everything you've completed the challenge.
We never got badges! Damn preferential treatment... I had to impersonate an officer of the peace on my own dime. Grrr...
"Badges? We don't need no stinkin' badges!"

Hah, well the only badge we've given out already was for people who helped with Maker Faire.  We all got laser cut badges.  I think badges are cool though, I've been looking for a site that can do general badges for things.
